name: Sing Your Heart Out
effect: A little surprise from the Flower-Feather Clan.
description: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. Said to be the Flower-Feather Clan's secret weapon for soothing their throats and protecting their vocal cords — so eat one and go sing your heart out! Just make sure you don't go overboard, as too much sugar can leave your throat feeling hoarse.

suspicious.effect: A little surprise from the Flower-Feather Clan.
suspicious.description: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. Its icy taste rushes through your mouth, setting your teeth chattering involuntarily and nearly half-freezing your heart. Forget about singing your heart out — even just making yourself understood is now a challenge...

normal.effect: A little surprise from the Flower-Feather Clan.
normal.description: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. Said to be the Flower-Feather Clan's secret weapon for soothing their throats and protecting their vocal cords — so eat one and go sing your heart out! Just make sure you don't go overboard, as too much sugar can leave your throat feeling hoarse.

delicious.effect: A little surprise from the Flower-Feather Clan.
delicious.description: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. These exquisitely crafted candies seem to send a wave of coolness down your throat, relieving hoarseness like bubbling springwater spilling forth and cleansing parched earth. Your voice is left sounding as clear as a newly-fledged hatchling, eager to spread its wings and fly up into the sky.
